intro: ^There was once a small, but fruitful kingdom.
^The kingdom was ruled by a historied line of monarchs who, above all, lived to serve their subjects.
^Inside this kingdom there were smaller villages led by local chiefs.
^The chiefs in these villages looked out for their villagers while also ensuring the monarch's rule was followed.
^The kingdom long lived in peace, though there were growing whispers among the villagers.
^The current king had no heir. He was growing old and could meet the ancestors at any time.
^If he died, what would happen to the kingdom in his absence?
^This is the story of such a time...
